str2: In like manner, likewise, just so. From hos and an adverb from autos; as thus, i.e. In the same way.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
To be of sound mind, be sober-minded, exercise self-control. From sophron; to be of sound mind, i.e. Sane, moderate.
